awards:
第13届釜山国际电影节(2008)
　　善才奖(最佳短片奖) Sung-hoon Hong
introduction: A girl in a school uniform comes to meet a middle-aged guy and introduces herself as the girlfriend of his son. She tells him that she’s pregnant with his son’s baby and asks him to accompany her to a gynecologist. Without a second thought, he takes her in his car and drives to a hospital. He feels embarrassed and also takes pity on the girl as he heads for the operating room with her..
